property.name: sashpos
property.help: The initial sash position.

property.name: sashsize
property.help: Overrides platform metrics if greater than -1

property.name: sashgravity
property.help: Gravity determines how much the left or top pane will grow while resizing.

property.name: min_pane_size
property.help: Minimum size for the panes.

property.name: persist_name
property.help: If a name is specified, wxPersistenceManager will be used to save/restore the sash position.

event.name: wxEVT_SPLITTER_SASH_POS_CHANGING
event.help: The sash position is in the process of being changed. May be used to modify the position of the tracking bar to properly reflect the position that would be set if the drag were to be completed at this point.

event.name: wxEVT_SPLITTER_SASH_POS_CHANGED
event.help: The sash position was changed. May be used to modify the sash position before it is set, or to prevent the change from taking place.

event.name: wxEVT_SPLITTER_UNSPLIT
event.help: The splitter has been just unsplit.

event.name: wxEVT_SPLITTER_DOUBLECLICKED
event.help: The sash was double clicked. The default behaviour is to unsplit the window when this happens (unless the minimum pane size has been set to a value greater than zero).

property.name: scroll_rate_x
property.help: Set the horizontal scrolling increment.

property.name: scroll_rate_y
property.help: Set the vertical scrolling increment.

property.name: scroll_rate_x
property.help: Set the horizontal scrolling increment.

property.name: scroll_rate_y
property.help: Set the vertical scrolling increment.

event.name: wxEVT_COLLAPSIBLEPANE_CHANGED
event.help: The user expanded or collapsed the collapsible pane.

property.name: persist_name
property.help: If a name is specified, wxPersistenceManager will be used to save/restore the currently selected page.

event.name: wxEVT_CHOICEBOOK_PAGE_CHANGED
event.help: The page selection was changed.

event.name: wxEVT_CHOICEBOOK_PAGE_CHANGING
event.help: The page selection is about to be changed. This event can be vetoed (using wxNotifyEvent::Veto()).

property.name: display_images
property.help: If true, will display an image on the tab in addition to any text.

property.name: persist_name
property.help: If a name is specified, wxPersistenceManager will be used to save/restore the currently selected page.

event.name: wxEVT_LISTBOOK_PAGE_CHANGED
event.help: The page selection was changed.

event.name: wxEVT_LISTBOOK_PAGE_CHANGING
event.help: The page selection is about to be changed. This event can be vetoed.

property.name: display_images
property.help: If true, will display an image on the tab in addition to any text. The image to use for each tab is specifed in the individual pages.

property.name: persist_name
property.help: If a name is specified, wxPersistenceManager will be used to save/restore the currently selected page.

option.name: wxAuiDefaultTabArt
option.help: Use bitmap art and a colour scheme that is adapted to the major platforms' look.

option.name: wxAuiGenericTabArt
option.help: Use platform-specific bitmap art and colour schemes on MSW and GTK, and wxAuiDefaultTabArt on Mac.

option.name: wxAuiSimpleTabArt
option.help: Use a simple art and colour scheme with a slanted left side for the tabs.

property.name: selected_tab_font
property.help: The font to use for the selected tab.

property.name: non_selected_tab_font
property.help: The font to use for the non-selected tabs.

option.name: wxAUI_NB_CLOSE_BUTTON
option.help: Adds a close button on the tab bar.

option.name: wxAUI_NB_CLOSE_ON_ACTIVE_TAB
option.help: Adds a close button on the active tab.

option.name: wxAUI_NB_CLOSE_ON_ALL_TABS
option.help: Adds a close button on all tabs.

option.name: wxAUI_NB_MIDDLE_CLICK_CLOSE
option.help: With this style, middle click on a tab closes the tab.

option.name: wxAUI_NB_SCROLL_BUTTONS
option.help: Display left and right scroll buttons.

option.name: wxAUI_NB_TAB_EXTERNAL_MOVE
option.help: Allows a tab to be moved to another tab control.

option.name: wxAUI_NB_TAB_FIXED_WIDTH
option.help: Display all tabs with the same width.

option.name: wxAUI_NB_TAB_MOVE
option.help: Allows a tab to be moved horizontally by dragging.

option.name: wxAUI_NB_TAB_SPLIT
option.help: Allows the tab control to be split by dragging a tab.

option.name: wxAUI_NB_BOTTOM
option.help: Place tabs under instead of above the book pages. Cannot be combined with wxAUI_NB_TOP.

option.name: wxAUI_NB_TOP
option.help: Place tabs on the top side. Cannot be combined with wxAUI_NB_BOTTOM.

option.name: wxAUI_NB_WINDOWLIST_BUTTON
option.help: With this style, a drop-down list of tabs is available. This menu can be displayed by calling ShowWindowMenu().

event.name: wxEVT_AUINOTEBOOK_PAGE_CLOSE
event.help: A page is about to be closed.

event.name: wxEVT_AUINOTEBOOK_PAGE_CLOSED
event.help: A page has been closed.

event.name: wxEVT_AUINOTEBOOK_PAGE_CHANGING
event.help: The page selection is about to be changed. This event can be vetoed.

event.name: wxEVT_AUINOTEBOOK_PAGE_CHANGED
event.help: The page selection was changed.

event.name: wxEVT_AUINOTEBOOK_BUTTON
event.help: The window list button has been pressed.

event.name: wxEVT_AUINOTEBOOK_BEGIN_DRAG
event.help: Dragging is about to begin.

event.name: wxEVT_AUINOTEBOOK_END_DRAG
event.help: Dragging has ended.

event.name: wxEVT_AUINOTEBOOK_DRAG_MOTION
event.help: Emitted during a drag and drop operation.

event.name: wxEVT_AUINOTEBOOK_ALLOW_DND
event.help: Whether to allow a tab to be dropped. This event must be specially allowed.

event.name: wxEVT_AUINOTEBOOK_DRAG_DONE
event.help: The tab has been dragged.

event.name: wxEVT_AUINOTEBOOK_TAB_MIDDLE_DOWN
event.help: The middle mouse button is pressed on a tab.

event.name: wxEVT_AUINOTEBOOK_TAB_MIDDLE_UP
event.help: The middle mouse button is released on a tab.

event.name: wxEVT_AUINOTEBOOK_TAB_RIGHT_DOWN
event.help: The right mouse button is pressed on a tab.

event.name: wxEVT_AUINOTEBOOK_TAB_RIGHT_UP
event.help: The right mouse button is released on a tab.

event.name: wxEVT_AUINOTEBOOK_BG_DCLICK
event.help: Double clicked on the tabs background area.

property.name: display_images
property.help: If true, will display an image on the tab in addition to any text.

property.name: persist_name
property.help: If a name is specified, wxPersistenceManager will be used to save/restore the currently selected page.

option.name: wxNB_FIXEDWIDTH
option.help: All tabs will have same width. (Windows only)

option.name: wxNB_MULTILINE
option.help: There can be several rows of tabs. (Windows only)

option.name: wxNB_NOPAGETHEME
option.help: Display a solid colour on notebook pages, and not a gradient, which can reduce performance. (Windows only)

event.name: wxEVT_NOTEBOOK_PAGE_CHANGED
event.help: The page selection was changed.

event.name: wxEVT_NOTEBOOK_PAGE_CHANGING
event.help: The page selection is about to be changed. This event can be vetoed.

option.name: wxTBK_HORZ_LAYOUT
option.help: Shows the text and the icons alongside, not vertically stacked (only implement under Windows and GTK 2 platforms as it relies on wxTB_HORZ_LAYOUT flag support).

event.name: wxEVT_TOOLBOOK_PAGE_CHANGED
event.help: The page selection was changed.

event.name: wxEVT_TOOLBOOK_PAGE_CHANGING
event.help: The page selection is about to be changed. This event can be vetoed.

property.name: display_images
property.help: If true, will display an image on the tab in addition to any text.

property.name: persist_name
property.help: If a name is specified, wxPersistenceManager will be used to save/restore the currently selected page and the expand/collapse state of sub pages.

option.name: wxNB_NOPAGETHEME
option.help: Display a solid colour on treebook pages, and not a gradient, which can reduce performance. (Windows only)

event.name: wxEVT_TREEBOOK_PAGE_CHANGED
event.help: The page selection was changed.

event.name: wxEVT_TREEBOOK_PAGE_CHANGING
event.help: The page selection is about to be changed. This event can be vetoed.

event.name: wxEVT_TREEBOOK_NODE_COLLAPSED
event.help: Generated when the page node is going to be collapsed.

event.name: wxEVT_TREEBOOK_NODE_EXPANDED
event.help: Generated when the page node is going to be collapsed.

property.name: show_effect
property.help: Set the effects to use when showing a page.

property.name: hide_effect
property.help: Set the effects to use when hiding a page.

property.name: duration
property.help: Set the duration of the animation (in milliseconds) used when showing or hiding a page.

event.name: wxEVT_BOOKCTRL_PAGE_CHANGED
event.help: The page selection was changed.

event.name: wxEVT_BOOKCTRL_PAGE_CHANGING
event.help: The page selection is about to be changed. This event can be vetoed.

property.name: select
property.help: Select Page when Adding

property.name: bitmap
property.help: Page Image (not all books use this)

property.name: select
property.help: Select Page when Adding

property.name: bitmap
property.help: Page Image (optional)

property.name: column_labels
property.help: Labels to use as column headers. Only used if the mode is set to wxLC_REPORT.

property.name: contents
property.help: Array of strings used to initialize the list view. Each string is a row, with text for individual columns separated by a ';' character. Only valid if column_labels has been initialized and the mode is set to wxLC_REPORT.

option.name: wxLC_VIRTUAL
option.help: The application provides items text on demand. May only be used with wxLC_REPORT.

option.name: wxLC_ALIGN_TOP
option.help: Icons align to the top. Win32 default, Win32 only.

option.name: wxLC_ALIGN_LEFT
option.help: Icons align to the left.

option.name: wxLC_AUTOARRANGE
option.help: Icons arrange themselves. Win32 only.

option.name: wxLC_EDIT_LABELS
option.help: Labels are editable: the application will be notified when editing starts.

option.name: wxLC_NO_HEADER
option.help: No header in report mode.

option.name: wxLC_SINGLE_SEL
option.help: Single selection (default is multiple).

option.name: wxLC_SORT_ASCENDING
option.help: Sort in ascending order. (You must still supply a comparison callback in wxListView::SortItems.)

option.name: wxLC_SORT_DESCENDING
option.help: Sort in descending order. (You must still supply a comparison callback in wxListView::SortItems.)

option.name: wxLC_HRULES
option.help: Draws light horizontal rules between rows in report mode.

option.name: wxLC_VRULES
option.help: Draws light vertical rules between columns in report mode.

event.name: wxEVT_LIST_BEGIN_DRAG
event.help: Begin dragging with the left mouse button.

event.name: wxEVT_LIST_BEGIN_RDRAG
event.help: Begin dragging with the right mouse button.

event.name: wxEVT_LIST_BEGIN_LABEL_EDIT
event.help: Begin editing a label. This can be prevented by calling Veto().

event.name: wxEVT_LIST_END_LABEL_EDIT
event.help: Finish editing a label. This can be prevented by calling Veto().

event.name: wxEVT_LIST_DELETE_ITEM
event.help: Delete an item.

event.name: wxEVT_LIST_DELETE_ALL_ITEMS
event.help: Delete all items.

event.name: wxEVT_LIST_ITEM_SELECTED
event.help: The item has been selected.

event.name: wxEVT_LIST_ITEM_DESELECTED
event.help: The item has been deselected.

event.name: wxEVT_LIST_ITEM_ACTIVATED
event.help: The item has been activated (ENTER or double click).

event.name: wxEVT_LIST_ITEM_FOCUSED
event.help: The currently focused item has changed.

event.name: wxEVT_LIST_ITEM_MIDDLE_CLICK
event.help: The middle mouse button has been clicked on an item.

event.name: wxEVT_LIST_ITEM_RIGHT_CLICK
event.help: The right mouse button has been clicked on an item.

event.name: wxEVT_LIST_KEY_DOWN
event.help: A key has been pressed.

event.name: wxEVT_LIST_INSERT_ITEM
event.help: An item has been inserted.

event.name: wxEVT_LIST_COL_CLICK
event.help: A column (m_col) has been left-clicked.

event.name: wxEVT_LIST_COL_RIGHT_CLICK
event.help: A column (m_col) has been right-clicked.

event.name: wxEVT_LIST_COL_BEGIN_DRAG
event.help: The user started resizing a column - can be vetoed.

event.name: wxEVT_LIST_COL_DRAGGING
event.help: The divider between columns is being dragged.

event.name: wxEVT_LIST_COL_END_DRAG
event.help: A column has been resized by the user.

event.name: wxEVT_LIST_CACHE_HINT
event.help: Prepare cache for a virtual list control.

property.name: label
property.help: The text shown just before the list control.

property.name: contents
property.help: Array of strings used to initialize the list box.

event.name: wxEVT_LIST_BEGIN_DRAG
event.help: Begin dragging with the left mouse button.

event.name: wxEVT_LIST_BEGIN_RDRAG
event.help: Begin dragging with the right mouse button.

event.name: wxEVT_LIST_BEGIN_LABEL_EDIT
event.help: Begin editing a label. This can be prevented by calling Veto().

event.name: wxEVT_LIST_END_LABEL_EDIT
event.help: Finish editing a label. This can be prevented by calling Veto().

event.name: wxEVT_LIST_DELETE_ITEM
event.help: Delete an item.

event.name: wxEVT_LIST_DELETE_ALL_ITEMS
event.help: Delete all items.

event.name: wxEVT_LIST_ITEM_SELECTED
event.help: The item has been selected.

event.name: wxEVT_LIST_ITEM_DESELECTED
event.help: The item has been deselected.

event.name: wxEVT_LIST_ITEM_ACTIVATED
event.help: The item has been activated (ENTER or double click).

event.name: wxEVT_LIST_ITEM_FOCUSED
event.help: The currently focused item has changed.

event.name: wxEVT_LIST_ITEM_MIDDLE_CLICK
event.help: The middle mouse button has been clicked on an item.

event.name: wxEVT_LIST_ITEM_RIGHT_CLICK
event.help: The right mouse button has been clicked on an item.

event.name: wxEVT_LIST_KEY_DOWN
event.help: A key has been pressed.

event.name: wxEVT_LIST_INSERT_ITEM
event.help: An item has been inserted.

event.name: wxEVT_LIST_COL_CLICK
event.help: A column (m_col) has been left-clicked.

event.name: wxEVT_LIST_COL_RIGHT_CLICK
event.help: A column (m_col) has been right-clicked.

event.name: wxEVT_LIST_COL_BEGIN_DRAG
event.help: The user started resizing a column - can be vetoed.

event.name: wxEVT_LIST_COL_DRAGGING
event.help: The divider between columns is being dragged.

event.name: wxEVT_LIST_COL_END_DRAG
event.help: A column has been resized by the user.

event.name: wxEVT_LIST_CACHE_HINT
event.help: Prepare cache for a virtual list control.
